original_text: And Hezekiah hearkened unto them, and shewed them all the house of his precious things, the silver, and the gold, and the spices, and the precious ointment, and all the house of his armour, and all that was found in his treasures: there was nothing in his house, nor in all his dominion, that Hezekiah shewed them not.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들의 말을 듣고 자기 보물고의 금은과 향품과 보배로운 기름과 그의 군기고와 창고의 모든 것을 다 사자들에게 보였는데 왕궁과 그의 나라 안에 있는 모든 것 중에서 히스기야가 그에게 보이지 아니한 것이 없더라

sentences.original_text: and shewed them all the house of his precious things,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 귀한 것들을 모두 저장하고 있는 집을 그들에게 보여주었으며,

sentences.original_text: and all the house of his armour,
and all that was found in his treasures:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 보물 창고에서 찾은 모든 것을 보여주었습니다:

sentences.original_text: there was nothing in his house,

sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 그들에게 보여주지 않은 것이 없었습니다.
